name: MXSegmentedPager
summary: Segmented pager view with Parallax header.
description: The standard MXSegmentedPager class is a simple paging control using [HMSegmentedControl](https://github.com/HeshamMegid/HMSegmentedControl). The ParallaxHeader category is an extension that allow you to add a [VGParallaxHeader](https://github.com/stoprocent/VGParallaxHeader) to your segmented pager.
